price: (Ey Muhammed!) Senden önce gönderdiğimiz peygamberlerimizden sor bakalım, Rahmân'dan başka ibadet olunan ilahlar yaratmış mıyız?
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
